# Load Data

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

swallows <- read_csv("Swallows Data Expanded.csv")

swallows <- swallows[,c(139, 1:138, 140:150)]
head(swallows)
```

# Make heatmap -- distribution to year

## Initial exploration (Alex's code)

```{r}
ggplot(birds, aes(x = Longitude, y = Latitude))+
  geom_point(aes(colour = species))+
  facet_wrap(~species)+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 9, angle = 45, hjust = 1))
```

## Swallows Distribution by years

Note: More data have been observed since 1994

```{r}
swallows_1994 <- swallows %>%
  filter(Year == 1994)

ggplot(swallows_1994, aes(x = Longitude, y = Latitude)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = SpeciesTotal)) +
  facet_wrap(~species) +
  theme_classic() +
  scale_color_gradient(low="yellow", high="red") +
  # scale_color_manual(
  #   labels = c("SpeciesTotal" = "Bird observation")) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 9, angle = 45, hjust = 1))
```



